<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Living Hair](/Feats.aspx?ID=1570) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Witch" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=323" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 102 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You can instantly grow or shrink your hair, eyebrows, beard, or mustache by up to several feet and manipulate your hair for use as a weapon, though your control isn't fine enough for more dexterous tasks. You gain a hair unarmed attack that deals 1d4 bludgeoning damage; is in the [brawling](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=4) group; and has the [agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [disarm](/Traits.aspx?ID=175), [finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196), and [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) traits.

<title level="2">Living Hair leads to...</title>
[Demon's Hair](/Feats.aspx?ID=2746), [Syu Tak-Nwa's Deadly Hair](/Feats.aspx?ID=2690), [Syu Tak-Nwa's Hexed Locks](/Feats.aspx?ID=2691), [Syu Tak-Nwa's Skillful Tresses](/Feats.aspx?ID=2689)
name: Living Hair
